model_output:
The comment seems to be emphasizing the potential opportunities in the areas around Montgomery County, MD given Amazon's potential presence which will cause the CS schools in the area, and arguably by extension, the University of Maryland, to be particularly enticing. They mention a high abundance of internships as one potential benefit. The writer doesn't appear to specifically compare this to Carnegie Mellon University at any point though. Although there may be a suggestion that if Amazon comes to Montgomery County, the CS schools nearby, including presumably Maryland, will become more attractive, this doesn't directly mean Maryland is superior to Carnegie Mellon University.

%%%
No preference
